get.description: Performs a comprehensive health check of the service and its dependencies
Returns service metrics and performance data

post.description: Resets all service metrics and counters to zero

get.description: Returns a simple pong response to verify service availability

post.description: Verifies if phone numbers are registered on WhatsApp
post.summary: Check if contacts are on WhatsApp

post.description: Retrieves detailed information about WhatsApp contacts
Creates a new WhatsApp group with specified participants
Sends an audio message to a WhatsApp contact or group
Sends an interactive button message to a WhatsApp contact or group
Sends an image message to a WhatsApp contact or group
Sends an interactive list message to a WhatsApp contact or group
Sends a poll message to a WhatsApp contact or group
Sends a text message to a WhatsApp contact or group
Sends a video message to a WhatsApp contact or group
Creates a new WhatsApp session with the specified name

get.description: Retrieves a list of all WhatsApp sessions

post.description: Starts the WhatsApp client for a session and generates QR code if needed

delete.description: Permanently deletes a WhatsApp session and stops its client

post.description: Stops the WhatsApp client for a session and disconnects it

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific WhatsApp session

post.description: Pairs a phone number with a WhatsApp session using pairing code

get.description: Retrieves the current status and connection state of a WhatsApp session

put.description: Updates the webhook URL and event subscriptions for a WhatsApp session

details.example: Session with ID 'test' does not exist
